# Projects

<h3>Computational Methods: Text Analysis in Python</h3>
<p>This project was conducted for the course <strong>Computational Methods: Text Analysis in Python</strong>. The goal was to explore how Latin America is represented in UN General Debate speeches using real-world text data, sentiment analysis, and topic modeling techniques.</p>
